title: Microlearning MOOC for Understanding Dementia and Field Application

context.prior_knowledge: Basic medical/social welfare knowledge or dementia-related job experience
context.additional_context: Theory-practice integrated dementia education for professionals in medical/legal/technical fields

learning_goals: Learners can explain at least three pathophysiological mechanisms of dementia.
Learners can apply personalized dementia management strategies to real-world cases.
Learners can create workplace dementia response guidelines based on MOOC learning content.

resources: Dementia Expert Interview Videos (Segmented by 5-Minute Intervals)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
